Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Shelter Hotel Los Angeles places you in the heart of Los Angeles, convenient to Wiltern Theatre and Hollywood Walk of Fame. This hotel is within close proximity of MacArthur Park and Paramount Studios.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 47 air-conditioned rooms featuring MP3 docking stations and LED televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and premium TV channels provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wiltern Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
MacArthur Park - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Paramount Studios - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Loyola Law School - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Good Samaritan Hospital - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Echo Park - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Angelus Temple - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
L.A. Live - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Staples Center - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Microsoft Theater - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Grammy Museum - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Barnsdall Art Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Los Angeles Convention Center - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Macy's Plaza - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Hollywood Palladium - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope) - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for Shelter Hotel Los Angeles is Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Shelter Hotels Los Angeles are:
